definitions.definition: One of several parallel horizontal layers of material arranged one on top of another .
A layer of sedimentary rock having approximately the same composition throughout.
Any of the regions of the atmosphere , such as the stratosphere , that occur as layers.
A class of society composed of people with similar social , cultural , or economic status .
A layer of vegetation, usually of similar height.
The level of accuracy of a computer's clock , relative to others on the network .
A historical layer of a language.

main_definition: One of several parallel horizontal layers of material arranged one on top of another .
secondary_definitions: ( geology ) A layer of sedimentary rock having approximately the same composition throughout.
Any of the regions of the atmosphere , such as the stratosphere , that occur as layers.
A class of society composed of people with similar social , cultural , or economic status .
( ecology ) A layer of vegetation, usually of similar height.
( computing ) The level of accuracy of a computer's clock , relative to others on the network .
( linguistics ) A historical layer of a language.
